content: the linen stitch is one of those stitch patterns that is geared towards beginners working this stitch in the round needs more understanding of what chain spaces looks like this pretty square is a perfect addition to any granny square blanket this square released as part of the hodgepodge blanket cal and you can find the full list of free granny square patterns here https //www cosyrosieuk co uk/free-granny-square-blanket-pattern-for-beginners
